info.summary:
Sergio Bittanti works as a Professor in Polytechnic University of Milan,Department of Electronics, Information and Bioengineering, and his\her h-index is 17, g-index is 44. His\Her interests are :
 Control System; Linear Systems; Periodic Systems; Kalman Filters; Mathematical Model;
